parameters.name: tax_in_percentage
parameters.description: order cost = products cost + products cost * tax

parameters.name: free_delivery_order_sum
parameters.description: after this order sum, delivery is free

parameters.name: default_delivery_cost
parameters.description: delivery costs this much if order doesn't sum up to more than :free_delivery_order_sum
